title: Growing Potatoes The Cheap and Easy Way!

tasks.task: Planting seed potatoes in the garden
subtasks: Prepare soil in designated garden boxes
Position seed potatoes in soil, ensuring proper spacing
Check on cabbage growth and address bug infestations
Monitor broccoli and brussels sprout growth
Harvest radishes and turnips as needed
Treat leafy greens (turnip leaves) for pest control
Consider alternative pest management strategies for greens
Provide garden updates via video channel
Respond to viewers' comments and suggestions
Encourage viewers to grow their own produce and engage with the community
